definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: quake (cf. (si vera 1.) Ar. h.arija be straitened, unable to move for fear and rage (Lane), also put oneself in a rage (Dozy); Targum [[חַרְגַת מוֹתָא]] De 32:25 terror of death)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וְיַחְרְגוּ מִמִּסְגְּרוֹתֵיהֶם]] Ps 18:46 pregn. and come quaking out of their fortresses (cf. [[יִרְגְּזוּ]] in like connex. Mic 7:17); rd. the same also in ‖ 2Sa 22:46 (for MT [[וְיַחְגְרוּ]], v. [[חגר]]; possible would be also [[ויחרדו]] in both, as Ho 11:10, Ho 11:11 etc.)
